text:
BetterVoice.com

Hiring an experienced AngularJS Developer to lead development on our new unified mobile+web front end.

REMOTE = OK!

Experience with Python/Django = Big Plus

Experience with VoIP/Telephony = Big Plus

You should be self motivated and able to get things done without hand-holding. You should be able to provide work to substantiate the previous requirement. BetterVoice.com is a profitable company based out of the Capital Factory in Austin TX.

Email: lyle - @ - bettervoice - .com
